mowerSpeed.help: Change the speed of the Simulation

displayStation.help: Decide wether a charging Station should be displayed or not

simulateCharging.help: Simulate charging the mower. Note: This only works with enabled charging station!

batteryCapacity.text: Battery capacity of the mower (Charging Timeout)

grassSize.help: Change the size of the background tiling

stationHint.value: Hint: Click the Charging Station open its menu
